summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for buidlguidl/ens-pg in May 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented a rejection system for ETH grants (Issue #110).
  - Added markdown export functionality for grants, allowing admins to export grant information (Issue #107, PR #108).
  - Increased the size of the comment field in the review interface for better usability (Issue #106).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved horizontal scrollbar issue on the admin page (Issue #102, PR #103).
  - Fixed form warnings and improved modal button sizes on specific grant application pages (PR #105).
  - Corrected TG bot notifications for large grants and milestone completions (PR #104).

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing admin functionalities and user experience through UI improvements.
  - Addressed several bugs to streamline the application process and notifications.

topIssues.title: Implement rejection system to ETH grants and stages
Admin > Add markdown export to the grants
Admin > Double the size of the comment field in the review interface (private notes)

topPRs.title: Add migration file with large grant tables
Export grants and large grants to markdown
Fix form warnings and change number on scroll
Fix TG bot notifications and add notifications to milestone completion
